class_notes: (No freshmen allowed to register in this class.) (The goal of this course is to explore how the brain gives rise to behavior. Topics include the nervous system, neuroplasticity, sensory and motor systems, attention, memory, sleep, emotion, motivation, social cognition, and brain and behavioral disorders.)
course_description: The neurobiology of sexual desire, hunger, thirst, arousal, drug addiction, and sleeping and waking.
sections: Class Nbr: 5325, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: Cohen/Soderberg, Status: Open
